name: Juno's Special Dessert
description: Upon normal attack, deals P.DMG equal to {1}% of ATK over time for {0} sec. This effect cannot be used with other similar effects cast by allies.
story: A dessert made by using the gelatin of a Slime. Mixed with the juice of fruit, sugar, and other sweeteners, all it takes to finish it is to heat the mixture and cool it down. Juno did not want the dessert to be named after her since it was made of monsters, but Yanne has secretly added Juno's name on the menu... Beware- this dessert may turn back to a slime if left unattended.
